name: Turbonomic Integration
description: Automates the creation of Turbonomic resources

metadata.longDescription: This template automates the creation of Turbonomic resources. These resources enable you to gain insights and take action on the cloud resources provisioned by a service

bullets.title: Operating Systems Supported
bullets.description: Not applicable. Template commands are run in the Terraform Runtime Service pod.

bullets.title: Prerequisites
bullets.description:
1. A Turbonomic instance
  2. A Turbonomic cloud connection
  3. The Turbonomic instance must be network accessible from the Terraform Runtime Service.

bullets.title: Turbonomic Resources Managed
bullets.description:
1. Service
  2. Database group
  3. Database server group
  4. Virtual machine group
  5. Virtual machine scale action policy

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. This template is intended to be used in a service, not as a standalone template.
  2. In order for cloud resources to be included in a Turbonomic group they must have the service_name and service_identifier tags applied.
